verses.roman:
tabe māyera garbhe haya sei ta' kumāra
śivānanda ghare gele, janma haila tāra

synonyms: tabe—at that time; māyera garbhe—the womb of the mother; haya—was; sei ta' kumāra—that son; śivānanda ghare gele—when Śivānanda Sena returned home; janma haila tāra—he was born.
translation: The son was in the womb of his wife, and when he returned home the son was born.
